title: Conduct On-Site Material Inventory Check
description: A foreman needs to check the on-site inventory of copper pipe to ensure there is enough for the next week's plumbing work.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current inventory level for '1-inch Copper Pipe' from the inventory management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: System shows 500 feet of pipe in inventory.

tasks.description: Compare the on-hand quantity with the forecasted need of 600 feet for the upcoming week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a shortfall of 100 feet.

tasks.description: Create a purchase order for an additional 200 feet of pipe to cover the shortfall and provide a buffer.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new PO is created to prevent a material shortage.
